live_updates: This issue has been resolved.  Thank you for your patience.

On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage.
Our technicians have been able to restore service to most of our affected customers and are continuing to work to get the rest online as soon as possible.
Our technicians continue to repair services through the night.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.

50111.summary: Some customers in the City Centre area of Langley are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
50111.title: May 30 -  Langley (City Centre) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

50118.summary: Some customers in the Dunbar-Southlands area of Vancouver, and those in Kitsilano are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
50118.title: May 30 - Vancouver (Dunbar-Southlands, Kitsilano ) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Services have been stabilized and the issue is now resolved. We thank you for your patience during the interruption.

Manitoba Hydro is on site making repairs. Once Hydro services have been restored, we expect Shaw services to come back online. Full list of Manitoba Hydro outages can be found at https://www.hydro.mb.ca/outages/
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
